name: @openreplay/tracker-assist
description: Tracker plugin for screen assistance through the WebRTC
author: Aleksandr K <alex@openreplay.com>

scripts.build: npm run build-es && npm run build-cjs
scripts.build-es: rm -Rf lib && tsc && npm run replace-versions
scripts.build-cjs: rm -Rf cjs && tsc --project tsconfig-cjs.json && echo '{ "type": "commonjs" }' > cjs/package.json && npm run replace-paths && npm run replace-versions
scripts.replace-versions: npm run replace-pkg-version && npm run replace-req-version
